resources.string: Sistem Aksesibiliti Privilɛj dɛn we dɛn yuz na dis savis na jɔs :
"- Aksesibiliti Ɔvlay : fɔ put wan bɔtin we nɔ de si rawnd ɛn dɔŋ di frɔnt kamɛra kɔt fɔ wok as sɔtkat fɔ di wok dɛn we di yuza dɔn pik"
Opin di ap we yu dɔn pik
Switch skrin braytnɛs bitwin lɔw ɛn ay valyu
Mek di kamɛra ol intaraktiv, pan ɔl we no notis ɔ ivin nɔ de fɔ sho, we yu klik pan di kamɛra kɔt, i go:
Aw fɔ ɛkskyuyt di fɛnshɔn we yu dɔn pik
Ple myuzik we yu bin dɔn ple trade
Opin di ap dɛn we dɛn jɔs dɔn mek
Toggle ringer mod (saund/mute). izi fɔ mute di fon bifo yu go slip ɛn sɛt am bak to sawnd mɔd we yu wek
Fɔs ɛnabul Dynamic Notification afta yu dɔn dɔn di sɛtin dɛn
Jɔs fɔ tɛst, nɔto rial notis.
Alaw ap fɔ wok na bakgrɔn
Duya rifer to dis wɛbsayt %1$s ɛn si stɛp dɛn wit pikchɔ dɛn
Animate di pɔsin we sɛn di pikchɔ
Aplay di Aps kɔlɔ dɛn to :
Ɔtomatik wan ɛkspɛn impɔtant notis dɛn
Wan impɔtant notis na di wan we dɛn kin gɛt as pop-ap notis
Start in fulskrin we di skrin de Off
Mek di kamera cutout as bil shep
Blur notis kɔntinyu we di divays lɔk.
Ad bɔda dɛn to di notis bɔtin dɛn
Display notis rawnd kamera ol ɔ na difrɛn ples dɛn na skrin wit bɔku mɔdan stayl dɛn fɔ pik frɔm. i kin sɛt bak as notis LED layt.
Yuz di kamɛra ol as bateri lɛvɛl indikɛtɔ as sɛkɔral layn rawnd di kamɛra ol i de sho bak se di chaj de go bifo.
Sho di dawlod ɛn ɔplod dɛn we dɛn de prosɛs naw as sɛkɔral prɔgrɛs layn rawnd di kamɛra ol.
Tɔn di ol we de na di kamɛra to shɔtkat bɔtin! sɛt indipɛndɛnt akshɔn fɔ ɛni tɔch, dɛbul klik, lɔng klik ɛn swip ɔl tu di say dɛn na di kamɛra.
Display animated icon ripresent chaj ɛn bateri lɛvɛl
If yu swip di notis we dɛn dɔn ɛkspɛn fɔ klia am, i go klia di rial notis bak
We yu klik Daynamik Notis, i go:
Klik go opin am ɛn lɔng klik go mek i big
Aplay di kɔlɔ dɛn we de na di wallpaper
We Daynamik Notis de si, ayd di stetɔs bar bay we yu kɔba am wit di rayt kɔlɔ ɛn we no Daynamik Notis ivin nɔ de sho di stetɔs bar
"Lokal akses. we yu nɔ go kip ɔ sheb yu data. ɔl di prɔsesin we dɛn de du lokal wan na kɔd na yu fon. - Kwɛri ɔl di pakej dɛn we dɛn dɔn instɔl so yu kin pɔsnalayz Daynamik Notis kɔlɔ fɔ ɛni ap. "
Fɔs disable Dynamic Notification dɔn enable Helper dɔn enable Dynamic Notification
Start fɔ mek i go bifo
Display we yu gɛt notis insay wan we we dɛn dɔn ɛkspɛn, i kin smɔl afta sɔm sɛkɔn ɛn yu kin smɔl, opin ɔ klia bay we yu intarakt wit am.
Display risiv notis in wan minimized fom, we yu kin expand, opin ɔ klia bay we yu intarakt wit am.
Display di notis we yu dɔn gɛt insay wan fɔm we dɛn dɔn ɛkspɛn if na impɔtant notis, ɛn insay wan fɔm we dɛn dɔn minimiz fɔ nɔmal notis
Wan tɛm afta dɛn dɔn gɛt di notis
Wans afta yu dɔn gɛt di notis, dɔn displei bak afta ɛvri tɛm we di skrin nɔ lɔk ɔ lɔk.
Alaw dis ap fɔ rɔn we yu want.
Alaw di sistem fɔ mek dis ap nɔ de rɔn sɔntɛnde.
Aplay effekt pan expand notis bak
Ifekt dɛn we dɛn de put
I impɔtant fɔ mek dɛn ebul fɔ du dɛn ɔda tin dɛn; fɔs ɛnabul Daynamik Notis Ɛp dɔn ɛnabul Daynamik Notis
Pik di ap dɛn we dɛn dɔn ɛnabul
Wan ret tek yu wan sɛkɔn min fɔ mi fɔ ɔltɛm ɛn ɛnkɔrej mi fɔ mek mɔ stayl ɛn ficha dɛn
Di tin dɛn we kin apin
Na di sem tin lɛk skrin kɔna dɛn
Blur skrin we yu manually expand wan notis fɔ fos pan di expanded notis
Dim skrin we yu manually expand wan notis fɔ fos pan di expanded notis
Fɔ fala di Do Nɔ Distɔb mod
Wach mɔ pas advatayzmɛnt fɔ gɛt mɔ tɔch

Ful skrin stayl, izi fɔ rid we fon nɔ de na an, izi fɔ riak ɛn riplay to notis. kin sɛt fɔ sho notis dɛn we di divays skrin ɔf ɛn bak fɔ mek di notis ayland big wit yu an to fulskrin mɔd we di divays skrin de on
Di pɔsin we sɛn di pɔsin in nem
Fɔ riak to notis dɛn we yu nɔ rid wetin de insay
Priviu sɛtin chenj dɛn tɛst Daynamik Notis
Na kol stet nɔmɔ (kɔl/nɔ kɔl), we yu nɔ no di kɔl ditil, fɔ avɔyd aksɛdintal tɔch we yu de na fon kɔl
"- Aksesibiliti Ɔvlay : so we yu gɛt notis, we di skrin de on, dis savis go drɔ wan smɔl privyu bar as tika nia kamɛra kɔt, gɛt notis ditil. "
Haptik fidbak (vaybrɛt we yu tɔch am) .
We yu kɔntinyu fɔ du dat, yu gri wit wi
Aplay (imej nɔmɔ) stayl fɔ chaj, myuzik ɛn ring ivin
Progresiv ring de sho se di bateri de chaj
Grin laytin we de blink rawnd kamera ol
Rɛd layt we de blink rawnd di ol we de na di kamɛra
Progresiv ring de sho se di bateri lɛvɛl we de naw
Sho bateri stetus indekator onlu we yu de pan lanch skrin
Yu no bored di tradishonal notis dizain pan android?!
Otomatik expand we yu de sho we di skrin de ɔf
Di we aw dɛn kin du am
Dɛn kin chaj am ɛvri mɔnt
If bɔku notis ɛn/ɔ tin dɛn apin
Display Dynamic Notification we de sho aw myuzik de ple
No Items available, duya tray bak.
Nɔ yuz data we dɛn gɛda ɔ sheb lɛk aw dɛn deklare am na Google Play stoa -> dis ap pej -> Data Sefty.
Nɔ sho insay we di skrin de na land skay mɔd
Nɔ wok we di skrin de na land skay mɔd
Di ap nɔ gɛt intanɛt akses pɔmishɔn, so yu data nɔ de go ɛnisay, yu kin mek shɔ se dis klem frɔm ap info -> pɔmishɔn, na google play ɔ lɔng klik ap aykɔn.
Dis divays nɔ gɛt ol we gɛt kamɛra. Bɔt yu stil kin yuz intaraktiv ficha dɛn bay we yu tɔch di ɔp sɛnta na di skrin lɛk se na ol kamɛra de
If di kamera cutout nɔto ol
If ɔtomatik ditekshɔn fɔ di kamɛra ol nɔ kɔrɛkt yu kin ajɔst am na (sayz ɛn ples) sɛkshɔn
Yu nɔ nid fɔ diskrayb dis opshɔn
Koloring notis privyu arawnd kamera cutout
Sistem Sɛtin -> Aksesibiliti -> ɛnabul/instɔl savis -> Daynamik Notis Ɛp
Yuz kamera cutout fɔ privyu notis we yu gɛt insay wan spɛshal ɛn kriyaytiv fɔm
Sistem Sɛtin -> Aksesibiliti -> ɛnabul/instɔl savis -> Daynamik Notis
Sistem Sɛtin -> Aksesibiliti -> ɛnabul/instɔl savis -> Daynamik Notis
Get NotiGuy layftaym prɛmiɔm fɔ af di prayz.
-> Na di fɔs chɛkbɔks nɔmɔ dɛn nid
Dɛn nid fɔ gɛt rayt fɔ du dat
Stetusbar we de na di belɔ we de na di sɛnt
Sɛntral na di bɔt ɔf skrin (nɔ strɛch an igen!)
Skrin rayt ed (i fayn fɔ mini stayl : IMAGE ONLY)
Ful wit ɛn ful ayt fɔ di stetɔs bar
We yu de pripia fɔ yuz fɔs, duya tray bak afta sɔm sɛkɔn.
Fɔ si di tɛm bifo dis tɛm
Display we di skrin de ɔf ɔ insay di sistem AOD
Displei fɔ chaj ɛn fɔ ple myuzik
I de mek pɔsin fil fayn!
Notis dɛn we dɛn kin ripit
Fɔ mɛmba yu bɔt notis dɛn we dɛn dɔn hang naw, we di skrin de On, ripit fɔ sho di ayland ɛvri %1$s sɛkɔn

IMPƆTANT: if yu gɛt ɔda ap we fiba am, tray fɔ stɔp notis dɛn pop-ap ɛn i nɔ wok... i go afɛkt dis ap ɛn mek i nɔ wok bak, so duya bifo yu tɛst, disable da kayn ficha de na ɔda ap dɛn, if i de. ɔ disable thier Notis Lisin
Notis: na samsung di ap kin ayd notis pop-ap bɔt i nɔ kin ayd samsung brif bar so duya sɛt notis sɛtin to Ditayl insay sistɛm sɛtin -> notis
Na fɔ jɔs sho Daynamik Notis we yu nɔ sho di ɔrijinal pop ap fɔ di notis.
Nɔ sho we skrin de na land skay
Sho fɔ chenj di ringer mod
Display brif animated icon ripresent di nyu ringer mod
Display Dynamic Notification we yu gɛt notis (ivent) ɛn skrin na
- fɔ wok we di skrin ɔf, Divays fɔ gɛt lɔk we, at ɔl (swip fɔ ɔplɔk) ɔ Ɔltɛm On Display Enabled
- if wan notis we dɛn gɛt we di skrin bin de on, ɛn di ap sho am, i nɔ go sho am igen we di skrin ɔf bikɔs yu dɔn ɔlrɛdi no se yu gɛt am.
Wan notis go mak as yu si am nɔmɔ we yu manually expand am, minimiz ɔ swip di expanded notis, swip di minimized notis ɔ dismiss di aktual notis.
Sɛtin dɛn we dɛn dɔn mek
If %1$s Ɔltɛm On Display bin On, sho dinamik Notis insay am
Semweso lɛk di saiz we di kamɛra ol gɛt
Na di sem tin lɛk di statusbar.
Sayz ɛn di ples we dɛn put am
Dɛn go ad nyu stayl dɛn na di rɛgyula

Yu sabskripshɔn go ɔto-rinyu ɛn dɛn go chaj yu di mɔni we dɛn dɔn tɔk bɔt ɔp ɛvri ia ɔ mɔnt (we yu pik) te yu kansel yu sabskripshɔn bifo di tɛm we yu bin de sabskripshɔn naw dɔn. yu kin manej sabskripshɔn ɛn ɔf ɔto rinuɛl frɔm Google Play akɔn sɛtin. ɛn frɔm dis ap hom pej -> ( Manage Subscription ) bɔtin
Swipe lɛft ɔ rayt go pul di prɛviu fɔ notis nɔto di rial notis. ɛn if mɔ notis dɛn de, dɛn go sho di nɛks wan
Fɔs dɔn sɛtup, ɛn mek shɔ se dɛn dɔn ɛnabul di pɔmishɔn dɛn we dɛn nid, dɔn klik tɛst fɔ stat 5 minit tɛst tɛm.
Yu kin tɛst prɛmiɔm stayl bifo yu bay. yuz prɛviu bɔtin (ay aykɔn) .
Di tin dɛn we de insay di notis
Di tɛm we dɛn fɔ du am
Kip am te dɛn rid di notis ɔ kankul am
Wan tɛm we yu tɔch yu, dat kin mek yu tɔch yu bay aksidɛnt!

"- wan dediket aplikeshɔn fɔ intaraktiv kamɛra ol. - mɔ ditayla ficha dɛn. - di abiliti fɔ sɛt separet fɛnshɔn fɔ singl tɔch, dɛbul klik, lɔng tɔch, swip to rayt ɛn swip to lɛft. - dipen pan wan permishɔn nɔmɔ."
Pocket Mode, Ignore tɔch dɛn we yu de na lɔk skrin

Wetin mek prɛmiɔm? dis tek wi wan intensiv had wok ficha laik riples sistem notis pop op en mek di dinamik notis ayt identical to kamera hol ayt na eksklusiv to dis ap no ap na ple stoa kin du dis inklud similar ap let alone stayl en kala
Stayl fɔ Notis we dɛn dɔn ɛkspanda
Dɛn kin chaj am ɛvri ia
